Abstract: Want to share how to play youtube in background without any app if you use iPhone.
分享一個 iphone 用 safari 開啟 youtube，並在背景播放音樂的方法。 Steps: settings / shortcut (設定 / 捷徑) Toggle the switch on “Allow Untrusted Shortcut” (開啟 允許未知的捷徑)
If you don’t see this switch or it’s disabled, you could open…

frontmatter.title: Running Youtube in background for IPhone
frontmatter.description: A way to run youtube in background without any app.
